headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Doomsday: Be Prepared
content: A serious job like this requires a lot of groundwork, but that doesn’t mean there aren’t shortcuts for those who want them. The Doomsday Heist’s prep missions take place in Freemode, dead in the sights of every other crew in town - so if you time it right you can steal their hard-won resources to advance your own heist progress. Or if you’re short on time, you can do it the American way - and buy the resources outright.
